name: Velvet Pouffe with Walnut Plinth - Tiger Mountain
description: Introduce a playful piece to your interiors with this small and versatile velvet pouffe. The fabric from Dedar, is a jacquard velvet with a strong personality and expressive capacity, originally inspired by Tibetan carpets but open to personal interpretations. The Velvet Pouffe features an ash-veneered plinth which is hand-stained walnut. With its compact shape, the pouffe makes ideal extra seating for unexpected guests, a chic footrest or a side table for drinks trays.
